```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```



```{r include=FALSE}
data <- read_csv("Random_forest.csv")
```

```{r}
nd <- data %>% 
   mutate(EPSPS = ifelse(EPSPS > 2, "Yes", "No")) %>% 
   select(-Date, -County, -OtherSpecies, -Rep) %>% 
  na.omit()
```


```{r}
skimr::skim(nd)
```

```{r}
nd %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Longitude, y=Latitude, color = EPSPS)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.4) +
  labs(color=NULL)
```

```{r}
nd %>% 
  count(EPSPS, CurrentCrop) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(n, CurrentCrop, fill=EPSPS)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge")
```



```{r}
set.seed(123)
trees_split <- initial_split(nd, strata = EPSPS)

trees_train <- training(trees_split)
trees_test <- testing(trees_split)
```



```{r}
tree_rec <- recipe(EPSPS ~., data = trees_train) %>% 
  update_role(PopulationID, new_role="ID") %>% 
  #step_other(currentcrop, previouscrop, threshold = 0.01) %>% 
  step_dummy(all_nominal(), -all_outcomes()) %>% 
  step_downsample(EPSPS)

trees_prep <- prep(tree_rec) 
juiced <- juice(trees_prep)
```


```{r}
tune_spec <- rand_forest(
  mtry = tune(),
  trees = 1000,
  min_n = tune()
) %>% 
  set_mode("classification") %>% 
  set_engine("ranger")
```


```{r}
tune_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(tree_rec) %>% 
  add_model(tune_spec)
```

 
# Train

```{r}
set.seed(456)
tree_folds <- vfold_cv(trees_train)

doParallel::registerDoParallel()

set.seed(345)
tune_res <- tune_grid(
  tune_wf,
  resamples = tree_folds,
  grid=20
)
```




```{r}
tune_res %>% 
  collect_metrics() %>% 
  filter(.metric == "roc_auc") %>% 
  select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = min_n:mtry, 
               values_to = "value",
               names_to = "parameter") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color=parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) + 
  facet_wrap(~ parameter, scales = "free_x")
```

```{r}
rf_grid = grid_regular(
  mtry(range = c(20,70)),
  min_n(range = c(2,10)),
  levels = 10
)
set.seed(246)
regular_res <- tune_grid(
  tune_wf,
  resamples = tree_folds,
  grid=rf_grid
)

regular_res 
```



```{r}
regular_res %>% 
  collect_metrics() %>% 
  filter(.metric == "roc_auc") %>% 
  mutate(min_n = factor(min_n)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mtry, mean, color=min_n)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5, size=1.5) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
best_auc <- select_best(regular_res, "roc_auc")

final_rf <- finalize_model(
  tune_spec,
  best_auc
)
```

```{r}
library(vip)

final_rf %>% 
  set_engine("ranger", importance = "permutation") %>% 
  fit(EPSPS ~ ., 
      data = juice(trees_prep)) # %>% select(-PopulationID)) %>% 
  vip(geom="point") 
```


```{r}
final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(tree_rec) %>% 
  add_model(final_rf)

final_res <- final_wf %>% 
  last_fit(trees_split)

final_res %>% 
  collect_metrics()
```

```{r}
final_res %>% 
  collect_predictions() %>% 
  mutate(correct = case_when(EPSPS == .pred_class ~ "Correct", TRUE ~ "Incorrect")) %>% 
  bind_cols(trees_test)
```
